original_title: Manning, Brady and Favre: The Quarterbacks
overview: In the NFL, quarterbacks belong to two categories: there are mere snap takers and then there are THE QUARTERBACKS men who use their mind, their voice and their arm to lead teams to victory. Tom Brady, Peyton Manning, and Brett Favre are three of these men and these are their stories.
title: Manning, Brady and Favre: The Quarterbacks
